de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.editors.featuremodel.layouts

Class FeatureDiagramLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.editors.featuremodel.layouts.FeatureDiagramLayoutManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BreadthFirstLayout, DepthFirstLayout, LevelOrderLayout, ManualLayout, VerticalLayout

    public abstract class FeatureDiagramLayoutManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates locations for all features in the feature diagram.
    Author:
    Thomas Thuem, Marcus Pinnecke, Edgard Schmidt, Stefanie Schober, Jann-Ole Henningson

      • checkIntersections

        public void checkIntersections(java.util.List<? extends IGraphicalElement> elements,
                               java.util.List<org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Rectangle> rects,
                               boolean verticalLayout)
        Checks if the passed elements intersect any of the given rectangles and removes those rectangles from the list that happen to intersect something. Should it happen that the passed elements are features, their connections will be checked for an intersection as well.
        Parameters:
        elements - graphical elements to check
        rects - rectangles to check
        verticalLayout - true if any vertical layout is selected

      • checkConnectionIntersections

        public boolean checkConnectionIntersections(java.util.List<FeatureConnection> targets,
                                            org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Rectangle rect,
                                            boolean verticalLayout)
        Checks for a certain feature if its connections are intersecting the given rectangle
        Parameters:
        targets - target conenction list
        rect - rectangle
        verticalLayout - is vertical layout?
        Returns:
        true if intersects
